I added a little bit to the test in 9008eede1c62 (branch `FixSetPositionForODEandBullet_scpeters`)

* expect SetPosition to return true in most cases
* add a test case with super large angles (1e15) and expect bullet's SetPosition to return false in that case

please consider merging it into this branch
